MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 15-JAN-2021 22:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the L21 and L30 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Nunsford Close, ST. Georges Street and surrounding Streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  5:15PM. Due to specialist resources required we now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:25PM on 15 January 2021.
